title: Sea Him The Series
overview: The boys love story of the character Tien, a senior photography student goes to Cua Can commune for his graduation thesis, and Tai, a poor man in a fishing village near the sea. The romance of the two characters progresses gradually from friendship, brotherhood. Through many interactions, rare incidents and redicilous hilarious moments, they take care for each other. Then they slowly progress into deep love from unknown moment.
